meanings.sent1: She ran frenzily around the playground, unable to sit still.
meanings.sent2: The dog barked frenzily at the mailman every morning.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel searched frenzily for its hidden acorn stash.
meanings.sent4: The wind howled frenzily through the trees during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The chef chopped vegetables frenzily to prepare for the dinner rush.

meanings.sent1: The children laughed frenzily as they played tag in the park.
meanings.sent2: The fans cheered frenzily as their team scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent3: The cat chased its tail frenzily, thinking it was a clever game.
meanings.sent4: The market buzzed frenzily with shoppers looking for bargains.
meanings.sent5: The students worked frenzily to finish their project before the deadline.
